ComicInfo.Summary: Ellis and Wolfer continue Volume Three "The Last King Of England": the newly formed Minor Seven are in far over their heads with the return of Bible John, and Gravel may have discovered his own powers have surprising, and inconvenient, limits. It's never a dull day being Combat Magician William Gravel.

ComicInfo.Title: The New Statesman
